content: In J.R.R. Tolkien's Middle-earth, what is the name of the hobbit who embarks on an unexpected journey to reclaim the Lonely Mountain from the dragon Smaug?

The hobbit you're referring to is Bilbo Baggins. He was recruited by the wizard Gandalf to assist Thorin Oakenshield and his company of dwarves in their quest to reclaim the Lonely Mountain from the dragon Smaug. This journey is chronicled in Tolkien's novel "The Hobbit."
